Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. define: Use this API to set address config of your shop.

error_list.name: logistics.address_not_found
error_list.description: The address is invalid. Please check the address.

error_list.name: logistics_error
error_list.description: Fail to update address because fail to update the impacted channels.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: System error. Please try again later.

error_list.name: logistics.inner_error
error_list.description: System error. Please try again later.

error_list.name: logistics.invalid_address_type
error_list.description: Address_type ({address_type}) is invalid. Please check the address_type.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: logistics.invalid_address_type
error_list.description: CN Address Only Allow Set Seller Return Flag

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.
